verses.verse: The word<WH1697> which came to Jeremiah<WH3414> from Jehovah<WH3068>, after<WH310> that Nebuzaradan<WH5018> the captain<WH7227> of the guard<WH2876> had let him go<WH7971> from Ramah<WH7414>, when he had taken<WH3947> him being bound<WH631> in chains<WH246> among<WH8432> all the captives<WH1546> of Jerusalem<WH3389> and Judah<WH3063>, that were carried away captive<WH1540> unto Babylon<WH894>.
And the captain<WH7227> of the guard<WH2876> took<WH3947> Jeremiah<WH3414>, and said<WH559> unto him<WH3068>, Jehovah thy God<WH430> pronounced<WH1696> this evil<WH7451> upon this place<WH4725>;

and Jehovah<WH3068> hath brought<WH935> it<WH6213>, and done according as he spake<WH1696>: because ye have sinned<WH2398> against Jehovah<WH3068>, and have not obeyed<WH8085> his voice<WH6963>, therefore this thing is come upon you<WH1697>.

And now<WH6605>, behold, I loose thee this day<WH3117> from the chains<WH246> which are upon thy hand<WH3027>. If it seem good<WH2896> unto thee to come<WH935> with me into Babylon<WH894>, come<WH935>, and I will look well<WH7760> unto thee<WH7489>; but if it seem ill unto thee to come<WH935> with me into Babylon<WH894>, forbear<WH2308>: behold<WH7200>, all the land<WH776> is before<WH6440> thee<WH413>; whither it seemeth good<WH2896> and right<WH3477> unto thee to go<WH3212>, thither go<WH3212>.

Now while he was not yet gone back<WH7725>, Go back<WH7725> then<WH1436>, said he, to Gedaliah the son<WH1121> of Ahikam<WH296>, the son<WH1121> of Shaphan<WH8227>, whom the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> hath made governor<WH6485> over the cities<WH5892> of Judah<WH3063>, and dwell<WH3427> with him among<WH8432> the people<WH5971>; or go<WH3212> wheresoever it seemeth right<WH3477> unto thee to go<WH3212>. So the captain<WH7227> of the guard<WH2876> gave<WH5414> him victuals<WH737> and a present<WH4864>, and let him go<WH7971>.

Then went<WH935> Jeremiah<WH3414> unto Gedaliah<WH1436> the son<WH1121> of Ahikam<WH296> to Mizpah<WH4708>, and dwelt<WH3427> with him among<WH8432> the people<WH5971> that were left<WH7604> in the land<WH776>.

Now when all the captains<WH8269> of the forces<WH2428> that were in the fields<WH7704>, even they and their men<WH582>, heard<WH8085> that the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> had made Gedaliah<WH1436> the son<WH1121> of Ahikam<WH296> governor<WH6485> in the land<WH776>, and had committed<WH6485> unto him men<WH582>, and women<WH802>, and children<WH2945>, and of the poorest<WH1803> of the land<WH776>, of them that were not carried away captive<WH1540> to Babylon<WH894>;

then they came<WH935> to Gedaliah<WH1436> to Mizpah<WH4708>, to wit<WH3458>, Ishmael the son<WH1121> of Nethaniah<WH5418>, and Johanan<WH3110> and Jonathan<WH3129> the sons<WH1121> of Kareah<WH7143>, and Seraiah<WH8304> the son<WH1121> of Tanhumeth<WH8576>, and the sons<WH1121> of Ephai<WH5778> the Netophathite<WH5200>, and Jezaniah<WH3153> the son<WH1121> of the Maacathite<WH4602>, they and their men<WH582>.

And Gedaliah<WH1436> the son<WH1121> of Ahikam<WH296> the son<WH1121> of Shaphan<WH8227> sware<WH7650> unto them and to their men<WH582>, saying<WH559>, Fear<WH3372> not to serve<WH5647> the Chaldeans<WH3778>: dwell in<WH3427> the land<WH776>, and serve<WH5647> the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>, and it shall be well with you<WH3190>.

As for me<WH3427>, behold, I will dwell at Mizpah<WH4709>, to stand<WH5975> before the Chaldeans<WH3778> that shall come<WH935> unto us<WH622>: but ye, gather ye wine<WH3196> and summer fruits<WH7019> and oil<WH8081>, and put<WH7760> them in your vessels<WH3627>, and dwell<WH3427> in your cities<WH5892> that ye have taken<WH8610>.

Likewise when all the Jews<WH3064> that were in Moab<WH4124>, and among the children of Ammon<WH5983>, and in Edom<WH123>, and that were in all the countries<WH776>, heard<WH8085> that the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> had left<WH5414> a remnant<WH7611> of Judah<WH3063>, and that he had set<WH6485> over them Gedaliah<WH1436> the son<WH1121> of Ahikam<WH296>, the son<WH1121> of Shaphan<WH8227>;

then all the Jews<WH3064> returned out<WH7725> of all places<WH4725> whither they were driven<WH5080>, and came<WH935> to the land<WH776> of Judah<WH3063>, to Gedaliah<WH1436>, unto Mizpah<WH4708>, and gathered<WH622> wine<WH3196> and summer fruits<WH7019> very<WH3966> much<WH7235>.
Moreover Johanan<WH3110> the son<WH1121> of Kareah<WH7143>, and all the captains<WH8269> of the forces<WH2428> that were in the fields<WH7704>, came<WH935> to Gedaliah<WH1436> to Mizpah<WH4708>,

and said<WH559> unto him<WH3045>, Dost thou know<WH3045> that Baalis<WH1185> the king<WH4428> of the children of Ammon<WH1121> hath sent<WH7971> Ishmael<WH3458> the son<WH1121> of Nethaniah<WH5418> to take<WH5221> thy life<WH1436>? But Gedaliah the son<WH1121> of Ahikam<WH296> believed them not<WH539>.

Then Johanan<WH3110> the son<WH1121> of Kareah<WH7143> spake<WH559> to Gedaliah<WH1436> in Mizpah<WH4709> secretly<WH5643>, saying<WH559>, Let me go<WH3212>, I pray thee<WH5221>, and I will slay Ishmael<WH3458> the son<WH1121> of Nethaniah<WH5418>, and no man<WH376> shall know<WH3045> it<WH5221>: wherefore should he take thy life<WH3064>, that all the Jews that are gathered<WH6908> unto thee should be scattered<WH6327>, and the remnant<WH7611> of Judah<WH3063> perish<WH6>?

But Gedaliah<WH1436> the son<WH1121> of Ahikam<WH296> said<WH559> unto Johanan<WH3110> the son<WH1121> of Kareah<WH7143>, Thou shalt not do<WH6213> this thing<WH1697>; for thou speakest<WH1696> falsely<WH8267> of Ishmael<WH3458>.
